institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 11 (cancellation of selection of project group and restrictions on support, etc.)
contents: Article 11 (Cancellation of selection of project groups and restrictions on support, etc.) ① Detailed standards for cancellation of selection of project groups and restrictions on support, etc. pursuant to Article 12 of the Operation Regulations shall be in accordance with Table 2. ② Project groups whose support is restricted pursuant to Paragraph 1. Must faithfully carry out the requirements of the Chairman, such as establishing a training plan in consideration of dispositions pursuant to laws and regulations related to vocational education and training, such as the 「Employee Vocational Competency Development Act」.
